event.title: was surrounded with countryside and now

data.event: The Guide reservoir was surrounded with countryside and now features a new pub called The Willows, DW Sports Soccerdome & Gym.

As part of the M65 extension work which was completed in 1997, a section of Haslingden Road, including the crossroads, was bypassed and the road became part of the A6077, which connects Blackburn town centre to the motorway.
